name: DriveNow sprl/bbva
goal: Implementation of free floating carsharing in european metropolis. Finding solutions for cities to solve traffic, emission and noise problems caused by individual traffic as well as freeing up parking spaces used by private cars.
interests: Communication, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: EU Commission car sharing framework programme linked to the Directorate General for Mobility and Transport (MOVE).
